name: Worm Slayer
description:
Worm Slayer..

..is a Fast-Paced Bullet Hell Roguelike where every enemy is a worm. Each worm is made up of segments, many with special abilities like shooting spikes and blocking attacks to stop you in your quest to defeat the Worm King.

Features:
  • 3 different playable characters, namely: The Knight, The Rogue, and The Mage.
  • A variety of different worms to battle, either being through species or just the different segments they harbor.
  • Unique floors for the player to travel through and explore, potentially finding hidden rooms, and even more interesting biomes.
  • The soundtrack was made solely by GlerG, with much love and dedication.
  • An interesting mix of digital art and a pixel art, leading to a refreshing feel when playing the game.
Hopefully releasing in 2023; BUT there is a demo out right now!
